@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<project version="4">
+  <component name="RemoteRepositoriesConfiguration">
+    <remote-repository>
+      <option name="id" value="central" />
+      <option name="name" value="Maven Central repository" />
+      <option name="url" value="https://repo1.maven.org/maven2" />
+    </remote-repository>
+    <remote-repository>
+      <option name="id" value="jboss.community" />
+      <option name="name" value="JBoss Community repository" />
+      <option name="url" value="https://repository.jboss.org/nexus/content/repositories/public/" />
+    </remote-repository>
+    <remote-repository>
+      <option name="id" value="BintrayJCenter" />
+      <option name="name" value="BintrayJCenter" />
+      <option name="url" value="https://jcenter.bintray.com/" />
+    </remote-repository>
+    <remote-repository>
+      <option name="id" value="Google" />
+      <option name="name" value="Google" />
+      <option name="url" value="https://dl.google.com/dl/android/maven2/" />
+    </remote-repository>
+  </component>
+</project>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<project version="4">
+  <component name="RunConfigurationProducerService">
+    <option name="ignoredProducers">
+      <set>
+        <option value="org.jetbrains.plugins.gradle.execution.test.runner.AllInPackageGradleConfigurationProducer" />
+        <option value="org.jetbrains.plugins.gradle.execution.test.runner.TestClassGradleConfigurationProducer" />
+        <option value="org.jetbrains.plugins.gradle.execution.test.runner.TestMethodGradleConfigurationProducer" />
+      </set>
+    </option>
+  </component>
+</project>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<project version="4">
+  <component name="VcsDirectoryMappings">
+    <mapping directory="$PROJECT_DIR$" vcs="Git" />
+  </component>
+</project>

@@ -0,0 +1,222 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:orientation="vertical"
+    tools:context=".MainActivity"
+    >
+
+    <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        style="@style/MyStyle">
+        <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText
+            android:id="@+id/main_field"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:textColor="@color/colorAccent"
+            android:inputType="text"
+            android:cursorVisible="false"
+            android:hint="@string/hind_message"
+            android:focusable="false"
+            android:focusableInTouchMode="false"/>
+    </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:orientation="horizontal"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        style="@style/MyLandScapeStyle"
+        >
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/one"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/one"
+            android:onClick="onNumberClick"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/two"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/two"
+            android:onClick="onNumberClick"
+
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/tree"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/tree"
+            android:onClick="onNumberClick"
+
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/four"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/four"
+            android:onClick="onNumberClick"
+            />
+    </LinearLayout>
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:orientation="horizontal"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        style="@style/MyLandScapeStyle"
+        >
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/five"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/five"
+            android:onClick="onNumberClick"
+
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/six"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/six"
+            android:onClick="onNumberClick"
+
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/seven"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/seven"
+            android:onClick="onNumberClick"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/eight"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/eight"
+            android:onClick="onNumberClick"
+
+            />
+    </LinearLayout>
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:orientation="horizontal"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        style="@style/MyLandScapeStyle"
+        >
+
+
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/nine"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/nine"
+            android:onClick="onNumberClick"
+
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/zero"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/zero"
+            android:onClick="onNumberClick"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/equals"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/equals"
+            android:onClick="getResult"
+            />
+
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/dot"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/dot"
+            android:onClick="onNumberClick"
+
+            />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:orientation="horizontal"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        style="@style/MyLandScapeStyle"
+        >
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/plus"
+            android:layout_width="@dimen/button_width"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/plus"
+            android:onClick="onNumberClick"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/clear"
+            android:layout_width="@dimen/button_width"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/clear"
+            android:onClick="clear"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/division"
+            android:layout_width="@dimen/button_width"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/division"
+            android:onClick="onNumberClick"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/multiplication"
+            android:layout_width="@dimen/button_width"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/multiplication"
+            android:onClick="onNumberClick"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/minus"
+            android:layout_width="@dimen/button_width"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/minus"
+            android:onClick="onNumberClick"
+            />
+
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/result"
+        android:textColor="@color/colorAccent"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="@dimen/layout_height_text_view"
+        android:gravity="center"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_text_view"
+        android:layout_marginRight="@dimen/margin_right_linear_layout"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="@dimen/margin_left_linear_layout"
+        />
+
+
+
+
+
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,36 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<TableLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    tools:context=".SettingsActivity"
+    android:orientation="vertical"
+    >
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/textView"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="@dimen/setting_text_view_height"
+        android:gravity="center"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_text_view"
+        android:text="@string/settings"
+        />
+
+    <TableRow>
+        <TextView
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/text_view_weight"
+            android:gravity="center"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_text_view"
+            android:text="@string/night_theme" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.switchmaterial.SwitchMaterial
+        android:id="@+id/mSwitchTheme"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        tools:ignore="UseSwitchCompatOrMaterialXml" />
+
+</TableRow>
+</TableLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

+

+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"

+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/division"
+            android:layout_width="@dimen/button_width"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"

+            />

+            android:id="@+id/multiplication"

+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"

+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/minus"

+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="@dimen/button_weight"
+            android:text="@string/minus"
+            android:onClick="onNumberClick"
+            />
+
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/result"
+        android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_bottom_linear_layout"

+</LinearLayout>

@@ -1,10 +1,41 @@
 <resources>
     <!-- Base application theme. -->
-    <style name="AppTheme" parent="Theme.AppCompat.Light.DarkActionBar">
+    <style name="AppTheme" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar">
         <!-- Customize your theme here. -->
         <item name="colorPrimary">@color/colorPrimary</item>
         <item name="colorPrimaryDark">@color/colorPrimaryDark</item>
         <item name="colorAccent">@color/colorAccent</item>
     </style>
+    <style name="AppThemeNight" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.NoActionBar">
+        <!-- Customize your theme here. -->
+        <item name="colorPrimary">@color/colorPrimary</item>
+        <item name="colorPrimaryDark">@color/colorPrimaryDark</item>
+        <item name="colorAccent">@color/colorAccent</item>
